Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia disculpar-lo aquesta vegada.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia explicar-li quina imatge s'havia creuat en la meua ment.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia imaginar-me que fóra capaç de tenir una escena com aquella.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia jugar amb totes dues alhora.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia llevar-li la vista de damunt.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia oblidar, mai.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia parlar d'una cosa que ni tan sols sabia que existia.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia perdre el temps que havia perdut amb ma mare.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia quedar, ja que dissabte havia d'estar a casa treballant.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia quedar-me més temps.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia refiar-me'n.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia ser que haguera oblidat el que havia passat la vesprada anterior.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia ser un altre.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia ser, una altra volta...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia telefonar-me, escoltar la meua veu.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia tornar a veure'l.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podia veure'l.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podien perdre tants anys de convivència veient com s'allunyaven cada vegada més.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podràs viure mai sense ella.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No podíem continuar així.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No poses aquelles tires de plàstic tan lletges que ha posat ta mare.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No pot mantenir-se a distància de les dones.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No pot quedar-se pel carrer!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No pots negar-te.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No pots pretendre que tot siga igual entre nosaltres.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No puc deixar passar més temps.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No puc més, no puc més.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No puc pensar en ningú.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No s'avenia amb ells.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No sabia cap a on em conduïa aquella amistat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No sabia com actuar.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No sabia com iniciar la represa.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No sabia on amagar-me!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No sabia què havia volgut dir-me en la frase que havia pronunciat entre dents.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No sabia si estaria preparada per a fer front a aquella absència.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No semblava bell, era interessant, una mica madur...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No semblava que tinguera cap idea d’acabar amb aquella manifestació de protesta.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No servia per a escriure.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No serà millor que et prepares les oposicions d'institut?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No seràs còmplice de la meua decisió.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No se’ls havia emportat la nit que els deixà.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No sé d'on són...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No sé per què ho vaig fer.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No sé per què tornes a dir el nom de Valentí.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No sé perquè ha vingut ací...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No sé quina hauria estat l'opinió de l'àvia en tot aquest afer.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No sé tampoc per què el vaig abraçar.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No sóc una ingènua.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No te'n refies.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No tenia cap motiu per a entendre que el meu xicot s'havia reformat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No tenia cap notícia de l'amic desaparegut i, és curiós, tampoc n'esperava.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No tenia cap voluntat de tornar-hi de moment.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No tenia el seu telèfon, no sabia on vivia.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No tenia un altre remei.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No tenia, doncs, la sensació d'estar enganyant-lo.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No tenim ni hem tingut cap entrada amb el nom de Fabrizio Pomarico!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No teníem cap pressa.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No teníem la confirmació dels seus motius.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No tindràs temps per a estar sola.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No tornaren a Alacant.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No treia res delatant-la.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No té cap idea interessant que explicar.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No us feu il·lusions.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No va caldre esperar la seua telefonada.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No va demanar-me permís.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No va entendre aquell joc...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No va referir-s'hi, li ho vaig agrair internament, que no em preguntara res més.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No va ser valent.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No va tornar mai més per l'institut.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No va venir aquella nit.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No va voler venir-hi; va donar el pretext del treball.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vages a casa del Riccardo i el Sandro...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig acabar mai aquella novel·la.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig dir res al Fabrizio en la conversa que mantinguérem pocs dies després.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig dormir en tota la nit.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig gosar trencar aquell moment de felicitat que hi havia entre els dos.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig notar cap indici estrany en la seua explicació...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig poder amagar la meua vergonya.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig poder continuar.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig poder evitar que els nostres ulls es creuaren.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig poder explicar-li què m'havia passat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig poder negar-me.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig poder parlar-ne fins que vaig ser a l'altra banda de la mar...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig ser a l'enterrament de l'àvia.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig veure la Laura.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig voler creure la meua amiga.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig voler fer-hi cap retret.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig voler que m'acompanyaren a l'aeroport.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig voler representar el paper que les germanes petites m'havien atorgat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vaig voler trobar una resposta a les meues qüestions.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vam menjar pràcticament res.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vam pronunciar cap paraula.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No van saber endevinar què m'havia passat amb el Valentí...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No venia de casa de la mare!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vol tornar en un bon grapat d'anys.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No voldria que li deixara cap missatge?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volem ser com són en la nostra família.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia adreçar-li la paraula.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia creure'l.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia enfrontar-me tota sola a aquella realitat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia fer-te mal...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia mai més compartir amb aquella antiga promesa cap espai íntim.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia obrir-li però havia d'aconseguir que callara.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia que descobrira el nostre amagatall.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia que els meus companys de pis notaren cap diferència.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia que jo contara res, que trencara el nostre secret.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia que ningú me'l furtara... la Donatella...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia que notaren cap diferència en el meu comportament.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia que tornara a oprimir-me, tampoc que m'agafara les mans.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia que vinguera a la seua ment.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia ser així.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia tornar a passar per aquell pis que només em portava records dolents.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No volia trobar la seua mare, tampoc aquell pare que els havia abandonat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vull que desaparegues com el meu amic Francesco.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No vull recordar més el passat, només vull viure el present, el meu present.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No és el fill de Valentí, el taxista?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No és la meua amiga.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No és per què no conega l’italià, perquè el parla bastant bé...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, Elena, no m'havia casat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, Fabrizio, no.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, Valentí, no!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, aquell xicot de conducta correcta no es mereixia cap escena de gelosia barata.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, certament... encara que podia ser que sa mare ara també l'hauria convençuda!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, el Nicola, no existia.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, era cert, els seus plors delataven que no en sabia res.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, havia de silenciar-lo, com fóra.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, jo no estava bé.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, mai no he sigut una dona per a compartir amb una altra...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, no em mereixia continuar vivint.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, no em quedava ningú a la meua ciutat, ja no era meua.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, no era la jove dels cabells llargs de l'altra vegada.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, no l'espiaria, em fiava de les seues paraules.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, no l'havia vista.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, no podia consentir que algú em diguera què havia de fer.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, no podia deixar-la.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, no podia reconéixer-ho.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, no podia ser la Donatella...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, no podia ser tan rancuniosa.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, no podia ser, que tot això fóra veritat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, no pot ser.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, no tenia força, potser tampoc ho volia, per a enfrontar-se a mi.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: No, no volia que anàrem més enllà.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només així ho podré fer, tornar a començar una nova existència.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només així seria lliure.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només amb les cendres de l'àvia.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només aniria amb la família durant les celebracions més especials.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només aquesta havia quedat vacant.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només cal que torne a ser jo mateixa.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només calia recordar els bruts negocis del pare del Fabrizio...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només crec en tu, estimada, va tornar a insistir amb la seua mirada feridora.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només el pas del temps.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només ell, el meu Fabrizio...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només els seus amics, els de tota la vida, podien tenir alguna pista.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només em quedava el Fabrizio, no el volia deixar ni una estona més sol.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només estic a gust amb tu.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només està per a mi!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només has de tenir la paciència per a esperar-me.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només havien trobat dos supervivents, però cap n'era el Francesco.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només heu de botar per damunt de l'aigua!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només l'Elena li havia dit en una carta que m'havia escapat a Nàpols.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només l'havia vist en una ocasió...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només l'àvia ho va saber, alguns dies més tard.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només l'àvia m'entenia i m'ajudava.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només la vaig besar.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només li facilitarien una nova màquina de cosir...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només m'agraden les dones fetes.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només m'estimava a mi.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només portava una tela vermella que em cobria lleugerament els pits.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només queda en el meu record el retall passat de la seua mort.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només t'estime a tu.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només unes petites converses per a mantenir encés l’afecte compartit.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Només va fer una telefonada a la mare.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Notava un lleu pessigolleig en el meu sexe.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Novament el cuc de la gelosia devorava les meues entranyes.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Nàpols em recorda París.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Nàpols era encara la meua ciutat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Nàpols no era Alacant.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: O amb la Donatella o amb una altra, Déu meu!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: O buscar la mare pels carrerons del barri del Fabrizio.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: O potser volia destacar la importància que la Donatella tenia en la seua vida?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Oblidem les nostres diferències.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Obligada, sense llibertat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Octubre ha començat i la casa comença a tenir un aspecte més habitable.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Ocupar-se de la senyora Dolors, ajudar-la a rentar-se, a vestir-se.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Odia'l, Marta, no el pots estimar.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Odiava la seua ciutat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: On anava totes aquelles vesprades quan eixia del treball?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: On era anit el teu Romeu?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: On era el Fabrizio?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: On era els divendres a la nit?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: On estava l'engany?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: On havia estat la nit anterior?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: On sempre estaríem junts.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: On serà el Fabrizio...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: On, tu, la meua princesa, has de ser feliç.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Parlar tot el que no havíem aclarit anteriorment.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Parlava molt bé d'aquell barri.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Passejava d'esma per la ciutat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Patia per saber quina seria la reacció dels meus pares.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Patisc especialment per la meua mare.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Pensava que era amb tu, nena!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Pensava que eren dues coses molt importants i privades.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Pense que ho van fer per animar-me.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per Francesco, va dir.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per a cap altre.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per a continuar respirant i no ofegar-me.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per a l'estiu, ja m'hi podria quedar.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per a mi, per quan volguera tornar-me a instal·lar a Alacant.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per a no perdre temps i poder començar una peça nova de seguida.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per a no sentir-me sola.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per a què van venir a estudiar?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per a ser estiu... hi ha molts turistes?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per això ha dit el seu nom...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per això havia començat a estudiar, sense que el pare en tinguera coneixement.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per això havia decidit no arriscar-se excessivament...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per això havia eixit.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per això la mare li donava de menjar.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per això m'agrada...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per això m'ha contat la relació singular que va tenir amb el seu amic...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per això necessitava veure els antics amics.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per això no hi havia més dones, només jo...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per això no va voler avisar-me que estava bé; era la seua petita venjança.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per això sempre ens mira quan parlem.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per això sempre estic al que el senyor rector necessita.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per això tampoc vaig gosar dir-ho a ningú.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per això va tornar amb la dona.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per contra, segons afirmava, jo feia més goig.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per culpa del Valentí.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per la línia de l'horitzó de la mar...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per la meua vida més llunyana.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per la puta de la Donatella, vaig pensar.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per la seua banda, el Riccardo va mostrar també una gran normalitat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per l’únic gust d’anar pel carrer, fora de l’estretor de les cases.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què actuava així el Fabrizio?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què aquella nit havien anat a sopar plegats, els dos sols?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què em mentia si sabia que podia assabentar-me'n tan fàcilment?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què fora de la ciutat?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què havia de malinterpretar els sentiments del meu estimat?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què ho fa amb altres?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què la seua família havia assumit que tinguera dues dones alhora?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què les besa?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què m'atreia?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què m'havia dit que s'havia bronzejat al terrat?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què me'n vaig anar?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què mires els horaris?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què no Barcelona?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què no em deia que havia vist la mamma tots els dies?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què no em telefonava?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què no m'has avisat que vindries abans?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què no n'havia volgut un altre?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què no ve, per què no telefona, per què no sé res d'ell...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què tenia vergonya...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què tornava just a l'hora de sopar?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per què un pont?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per recordar-la sempre, perquè em fera companyia.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per recuperar totes les forces perdudes i assaborir les experiències viscudes.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per tal de situar correctament la història de la meua protagonista.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per tant, no hi havia cap problema que anara.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per tant, vaig acceptar.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per telèfon m'ha dit que està encantada amb la meua visita.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per tota la costa mediterrània...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per trencar una amistat que m’angoixava més cada dia.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Per veure una vegada més el vaixell que s’havia emportat el marit per sempre.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Percebia la suavitat de les seues mans.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perdia, a poc a poc, la meua llibertat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perduda, encara que intentara negar-m'ho a mi mateixa.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perduts al bell mig de la mateixa mar, sense rumb.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè Nàpols era ja una mica meua.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè algun dia deixaria de ser dona i ell buscaria altres dones...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè amb aquest descobriment m'adonava que ell no m'estimava.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè aquella nit, com sempre, no vaig dormir.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè començava a creure que mai no tornaria.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè d'una manera incerta i sorprenent, tot va tornar a l'equilibri anterior.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè el bany, a Nàpols, és realment impossible.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè el dia que havia desaparegut no havia deixat les còpies a casa.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè ell no es refiava del nostre cotxe llogat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè ell no estudiava, no feia res.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè en el seu interior es gestava la passió.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè era la llengua dels nostres reis comuns, no creu vosté?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè estava fart de viure sol.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè fóra ell de nou.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè has estat una nena molt bona.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè jo a penes el veig...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè jo sempre he estat devota d'aquella Maria Magdalena, quina santa!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè jo també n'he escrit, de poemes.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè jo volia aguantar, que ja era un home valent.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè l'afecte del Fabrizio m'ha immunitzat per sempre.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè la teua filla serà a Nàpols, no?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè l’enyore, de tant en tant.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè m'has begut l'ànima...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè necessitava reflectir als papers el turmentat món que esclatava en el meu interior.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè no volia tornar mai més sola a la meua ciutat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè pensava que era mort, ofegat per l'aigua.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè quan vaig tornar al pis, encara hi estava.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè sempre dibuixes en la teua mirada les siluetes de les coses.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè sempre seria la seua amiga...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè si abans havia estat jo qui fugia, ara era jo l'abandonada.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè sovint recordava que se n'aniria.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè tot el que ell em contava era referit a ell mateix.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè tu no ets d’ací, no?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè tu no t'has casat, com jo, no és així?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè volem ser lliures i no dependre de la família...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè volia tastar el gust dels núvols.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè volien buscar algú que les col·locara, que les separara definitivament dels pares!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè és meua i de ningú.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè, Marta, sóc teu.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè, Marta, tu saps que m'hauria agradat també acompanyar-te!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè, de tant en tant, també agraïa no compartir llit.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè, en definitiva, oblidara i acceptara que havia d'esperar sense patir.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Perquè, filleta, els homes d'abans no eren com els d'ara.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però a Nàpols no hi era.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però al més mínim presagi, el faria fora.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però amb el Fabrizio he pogut acoblar-me.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però amb ell era distint.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però amb ell sobri.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però ara estava lliure, per això havia tornat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però el Fabrizio no estava amb els amics; tampoc sol...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però el cuc de la gelosia també foradava el meu interior...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però el seu cos m'atreia.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però ell li havia jurat que només m'estimava a mi.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però ell no era sempre allà, a la meua casa.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però ell no estava feliç i bevia més i més.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però ells sospitaven alguna cosa, més endavant m'ho digueren.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però els estimava, Déu meu, els estimava.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però he preferit que ho feres tu de part meua.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però ho vaig entendre de seguida.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però jo l'estimava.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però jo li veia la cara, era com jo.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però jo m'hi deixava fer.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però jo no sabia que un nou enigma s'acostava a la meua vida.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però la situació era en aquell moment ben distinta.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però mirava el mar, fixament, com mai no ho havia fet.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però no menjava; s'oblidava de fer-ho.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però no podia, les circumstàncies m'arrossegaven.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però quan acaba, apareix, canvia de camisa o es limita a apartar la mirada.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però si no portem cap bossa de viatge, estem sense roba!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però tranquil·la, nena, la Donatella és fora, ben lluny!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però un núvol de boira espesseïa la visió del futur.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però va equivocar-se, no llegia res de Calvino aquell dia de platja.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però volia alguna cosa, era cert.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però, per què m'havia posat així?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Però, per què no havia deixat cap nota?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Petits mossos fins a trobar les orelles, pel seu interior i pels ulls...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Plovia encara més i he buscat un taxi i no em paraven...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Pobreta, Marta, pobreta.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Podem jugar a escacs i tot.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Podia dedicar més temps a veure la família, sense preocupar-me tant pel curs següent.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Podia dubtar d'altres afirmacions del meu amant, però no de les seues tendències.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Podia estar tranquil·la de la seua fidelitat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Podia parlar amb la mateixa Donatella.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Podia sentir-me gelosa del Francesco, que ara el tenia al seu costat...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Podia ser una coincidència.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Podia telefonar a la policia.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Podia visitar la família quan volguera.

Sentence: Podrem dormir les dues juntes.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Podria muntar una exposició amb totes les aquarel·les del meu amic!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Podria portar endavant el viatge que havia planejat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Podria viure sola.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Podríem haver anat amb tren, dona... ens hauria sortit més a compte!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Podíem aprofitar les vacances de Pasqua.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Portava més diners a casa, és cert.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Portava una carta signada per la directora d’un liceu privat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Portaven dues jaquetes de pell d'aquestes que escalfen molt... crec que fosques...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Porte amb mi les cendres de l'àvia, la caixa vermella que òbric amb discreció.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Porteu-me a la platja, porteu-me a la platja...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Posa-la a l'aparell i l'escoltarem.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Posa-les als prestatges del rebost.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Posar aquell nom al pobre nen no era ben bé un bon presagi.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Posar la rentadora, endreçar la casa.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Pot haver-ne un centenar en aquesta ciutat...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Pot ser una altra persona!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Pots imaginar-te la meua cara d’al·lucinació.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser a conseqüència dels excessos de la nit de cap d’any.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser algú en tindria alguna altra pista...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser aquest és el motiu que ha dificultat les meues relacions futures.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser cosa de setmanes, de mesos.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser després de dinar ens estirem una mica, d'acord?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser donava massa crèdit a les meues intuïcions...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser el company del Fabrizio era algun treballador del vaixell.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser el conegues, el meu fill...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser encara mantenia l’esperança de veure’l tornar.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser era una mica massa cruel.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser hauria estat millor que li ho haguera dit, que me n'anava.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser havia baixat a comprar alguna cosa...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser havia buscat inconscientment el jove que acabava de conéixer.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser havia tingut por d’aquell joc... e
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser ho accepte, li va dir la seua mare.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser ja la tenia, abans.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser ja s'entenien abans, jo no sabia a quina hora tornava ell del treball.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser l'empremta d'aquella vesprada passada al taxi del Valentí és encara vigent.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser millor que no vindrà mai...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser no acabava de creure’m la nostra relació.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser no era la Donatella.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser tenia gelosia de la meua reacció?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser vindrà i tornarà amb mi.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser volia mentir-me a mi mateixa?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser, a hores d'ara, és a algun bordell de la regió...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Potser, estiga on estiga, també continua estimant-me...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Preferia quedar-me sola, al meu amagatall.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Preferia quedar-se entre els nostres llibres, fent qualsevol cosa.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Pren, ací tens un regal que t’ha deixat la Befana.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Presentava un conjunt interessant de taulells acolorits.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Presoneres per a tota la vida!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Primer a la galta esquerra i després a la dreta.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Primerament València, després potser França...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Primerament, ell es va sentir traït; el seu amic no havia volgut confiar-hi.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Procedien de la contemplació de la mar de Nàpols.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Prompte el meu amic va reaccionar.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Prompte estarien acabades i, per al pròxim estiu, ja podríem quedar-nos.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Prompte estaré amb tu.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Prompte ho vaig entendre.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Prompte tindré el permís de conduir...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Prompte va assumir els canvis.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Prompte vaig entendre per què ho havia fet.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Pronuncia de manera decidida el meu nom.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Puc prendre’m el luxe d’ocupar un any a resituar-me al poble.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Qualsevol acte podia ser positiu en aquell moment.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan anàvem la trobàvem en la seua butaca.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan el Creta atracava en algun port el Fabrizio em telefonava.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan el Fabrizio enraonava em sentia molt bé.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan el Riccardo s'adonà que me n'anava va implorar, jo també estic malalt.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan el Valentí va fugir de mi, després d'haver reconegut que jo l'estimava...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan jo era amb els pares durant les últimes setmanes.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan l'àvia va morir, les colombianes van abandonar el pis.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan plegava la roba d’una manera, quan netejava el terra de genolls.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan se n'havia anat?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan sigueu dones, ja sabeu... aviseu-me!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan torne, li dius que estic buscant-lo.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan va acabar el curs, vaig preparar les caixes.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan va acabar, es va torcar amb la meua roba interior.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan va venir amb el teu regal em va trobar despert.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan va venir amb el teu regal, em va trobar despert.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan vaig deixar l'Elena i tot el que representaven els companys de la Facultat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan vaig retrobar-los, la calma regnava entre tots dos.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quan vingues a l'estiu ja ens apanyarem.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quant de temps fa que el meu home va deixar de jugar-hi?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quant de temps havíem estat compartint el nostre amant?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quants capítols has fet?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que agafaren immediatament les seues coses.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que alguna vegada me n'hauria de tornar, que no podria quedar-me tota la vida.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que anem a passar el cap de setmana a Roma?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que el jovenet s'alimente bé...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que els anys passaven i m'anava distanciant dels meus pares, de la meua mare...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que els seus pares, que eren bons amics seus, li havien donat el número.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que es diu Valentí, el teu marit?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que es quedara amb mi.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que estaria allí fins que jo anara, que m'ho contaria tot...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que has tingut algun problema amb el xiquet?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que ho faig pel teu bé, nena... vinga, va, escriu.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que ja estava bé de mentides i hipocresies.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que ja havia passat el temps d'ensenyar, que ell estava ara perquè l'ensenyaren...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que jo no serviria.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que jo vaig estar al llit del meu marit fins que se'm va retirar.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que l'estimava i no el volia perdre.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que l'havia estimada fins que m'havia conegut.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que la mar que l'envoltava m'aïllara, potser per sempre, del meu estimat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que la vida començava a ser-me una mica aliena.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que les dues famílies sempre havien estat molt unides.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que les pujara a casa i que m'esperara, que havíem de parlar.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que li han fet perdre el trellat...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que m'havia contat els seus secrets d'adolescent.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que m'havia deixat plantada, amb la paraula a la boca.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que m'havia intentat fer l'amor i jo m'hi havia negat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que m'havien dit que estava besant-se amb una jove grassoneta abans de les vacances!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que no els tingues por, que els abordes d'una manera directa, decidida...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que no em vera el Fabrizio, que estava a punt de tornar del mercat...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que no es fera major.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que no heu vist mai un home com jo?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que no sabera on estava.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que no saps res del meu fill?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que no veus les bajanades que fan a classe!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que no volia saber res d'ell.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que pensara que era mort...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que portava diners, sí, però no volia comprar res...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que quan se n'assabentà, és clar, es va enfadar amb ell.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que sabia que ell m'agradava, que n'estava enamorada.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que se n'anara.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que sense mi no podia viure.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que sense tu no puc viure.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que siguen testimonis de la nostra estima!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que som al maig i fa calor!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que t'has adormit?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que tenien unes platges fantàstiques, que des de l'autopista les havia vistes.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que trobara una altra estima.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Que, a Nàpols, tot estava vist i comprat.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Queda el record i la il·lusió perquè amb l'aigua de la mar prenga força.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Queda't amb mi.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quedaven al marge tots els meus dubtes, els meus temors.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quedaven ben lluny les meues pors anteriors.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Qui era aquella dona?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Qui havia tingut la idea d'anar a sopar junts?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Qui podia imaginar que aquella embarcació estiguera sabotejada perquè s'enfonsara?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Qui t'ho ha dit?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Qui és el xicot que t'ha acompanyat?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Qui és, aquest Valentí?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quin és el seu secret, la seua estratègia per a dominar-nos?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quina mena de cregut, el Valentí!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quina pinta portava, la franceseta!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quina sorpresa més podria donar-me aquella carta...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Quina vergonya, Mare de Déu, si hagueren sentit els meus crits!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Què feu allà, a Nàpols?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Què has fet per a menjar?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Què havia fet amb ella?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Què m'havia passat?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Què m'importava ara si els visitaria el dia de Reis!
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Què s'havia pensat aquell metge, que una dona als quaranta ja no serveix?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Què t'ha dit?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Què tenia a veure la seua mare en tota aquesta situació?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Què vols dir, àvia?
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Recollia els treballs lliurats per emportar-me'ls a casa.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Recordaré els teus ulls mirant la ratlla de l'aigua des del terrat de casa.
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Recordava encara el nom que hi havia al timbre, Dalmau...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Recorde que li vaig preguntar per aquella revelació...
Source: From Marta dibuixa ponts by Carles Cortés, with the permission of the author.

Sentence: Recordes la història que et vaig contar del Francesco, supose.
